title: Mobile data use doesn't work for playing league of legends ?
body: Hi I currently have a wi-fi problem and it may last a week or two, So I would really want to know if there is anyway I can play league of legends using my mobile data cause right now I tryed it once in ranked game in my placements and after I picked my champ I just couldn't connect to the game and it just bugsplated, I already send a bugsplat explaining my issues and didn't get any anwser so please tell me if you have any solutions or at least tell me how long is it before I get demoted for not being active, thanks.

replies.body: The bugsplat error isn't normally due to a connection problem, but more of a driver or bad game file failing to load it.  You'll want to go over the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot this.  Keep in mind, though, that mobile data might still be unstable and cause you issues regardless.  You should test it in a custom game before you join a match with others to be sure!
I second trying it out first, but from experience i can tell you mobile data can work, depending on how good your connection is.
